pkmkdoc.description:
MacUIM is an input method for Mac OS X implemented by uim. http://code.google.com/p/macuim/
* Caution * Login again after install this software.
GNU gettext is static linked with several programs and libraries. Sary and GLib are static linked with sary-ruby. Glib, ATK, GTK+, Pango, Cairo, libpng, pixman are static linked with uim-candwin-gtk. Curl and Expat are statically linked with libuim-curl.so and libuim-expat.so respectively. Freetype2 is static linked with m17n-lib.
uim: http://uim.googlecode.com/
uim will be installed into /Library/Frameworks/UIM.framework.
Anthy: http://anthy.sourceforge.jp/
Anthy will be installed into /Library/Anthy.
PRIME: http://taiyaki.org/prime/
PRIME will be installed into /Library/PRIME.
SKK dictionaries: http://openlab.ring.gr.jp/skk/dic.html
SKK Dictionaries will be installed into /Library/Dictionaries/SKK.
m17nlib: http://www.m17n.org/
m17nlib will be installed into /Library/M17NLib.
Ispell: http://ficus-www.cs.ucla.edu/geoff/ispell.html
ispell will be installed into /Library/M17NLib.
The following softwares will be installed into /Library/PRIME.
sary-ruby: http://namazu.org/~satoru/sary/#ruby
Ruby/ProgressBar: http://namazu.org/~satoru/ruby-progressbar/
